Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class GameServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This is the GameServer class that creates a thread for each new client.
